name: Fit Twill Shirt for Woman
description: Short kimono-type jacket, made of stuffed animal with contrast embroidery. The ribbon applied to the front of the central opening and the neck adds a boho and artisan air to this warm and canchera garment.

name: Women's Faux-Trim Shirt
description: Plush jacket with ethnic-inspired embroideries, with metal closure on the front, hood and appliqué on the waist and cuffs. The synthetic fur detail on the hem and hood adds a wave to this very seventies boho folk coat.

name: Soft Touch Interlock
description: Short-sleeved, moldería-fit T-shirt, made of 100% cotton jersey, with a jersey neckline and V-neckline. Its comfortable fabric and impeccable fit make it an essential staple of the season.

name: Grand Atlantic Chukka
description: Long printed shirt. Mandarin collar and V neckline. Front closure with metal buttons. Long sleeve ending in cuff. Fake pocket detail. It has a yoke on the back.

name: Cotton Shirt for Women
description: Leopard print coat, front opening with black buttons. Black studs on applied pockets and cuffs.

name: Casmart Smart Shirt
description: Fit T-shirt, made of 100% cotton, soft to the touch, with a contrast ribbed neckline. It has a central water-based typographic print. A seventies-inspired item, to complement various looks.

name: Ribbed Cotton Bodysuits
description: Tailored coat made of cloth with wool, with two-button crossover closure and flap pockets. On the sleeves it has a detail of 3 buttons as a closure on the cuffs. A classic coat, impeccably cut, versatile to combine with everything.

name: Double-breasted Blazer
description: Woven cover made with mohair, polyamide, acrylic and lurex. With a wide and relaxed fit, long until below the tail, the combination of fabric guards add a warm and cozy air to this item, perfect for colder days. It has a branded pad on the back.
